verses.roman:
mūla-ślokera artha karite prakāśa
artha lāgāite āge kahiye ābhāsa

synonyms: mūla—original; ślokera—of the verse; artha—the meaning; karite—to make; prakāśa—revelation; artha—the meaning; lāgāite—to touch; āge—first; kahiye—I shall speak; ābhāsa—hint.
translation: Just to explain the original verse, I shall first suggest its meaning.
